info.name: zive.cz - dark
info.description: dark theme for zive.cz and mobilmania.cz, connect.zive.cz, jpn.zive.cz and vtm.zive.cz
info.additionalInfo:
Keep in mind this theme does not work as an adblocker. Ads may mess with the theme.

Version 1.1
- fix top menu
- hide ugly footer
Version 1.0
- fixed poradna zive
Version 0.2
- more contrast colors on connect and mobilmania
Version 0.1
- initial release
